Lit with brilliant glare of what could be, sat our lofty ideals 
of an equitable balance.

of an equitable balance.
……….Balance………

fddd2c393993.title:
Be it Life or Loss
Be it Love or Hate
Be it Questions asked
or Silence sought
It matters not
All…

paragraphs.text:
Be it Life or Loss
Be it Love or Hate
Be it Questions asked
or Silence sought
It matters not
All seeking ends
at the Peace found
in Balance.

paragraphs.text:
Balance
Stability’s illusion discarded,
Balance dances a wind whipped line
Over Chaos’ chasm
En pointe.medium.com
Hard to find,

Balance is for 
Skateboarders,
Restaurant servers
And funambulists,
Not for lovers, 
Families, 
Passionate work,
Or…medium.com
